articles.title: Methanol poisoning deaths highlight SE Asia's fake alcohol problem - BBC.com
articles.description: The deaths of five tourists after apparently drinking tainted drinks highlight the wider issue of bootleg alcohol.
articles.content:
Towns like Vang Vieng in Laos - where the fatal poisonings took place - are known stops on the backpacking trail through South East Asia
Suspected methanol poisoning from tainted drinks has reported… [+4844 chars]
